summary: After one race where the fastest fable alive was beaten by the slowest fable alive, compete against each other again through the most dangerous race in the world with there only child! Who Will Win the race?
cast: Drake Bell|Chris Elwood|Vivica A. Fox|Adam Friedman|Danny Glover|Jay Leno|Nolan North|Keke Palmer|Jenni Pulos|Steve Wilcox
keywords: animal in title|character name in title
director: Directors: Howard E. Baker, Arish Fyzee
